ModMetaData.name: Mashed's Ashlands
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
A completely remade version of my oldest mod, made to a much higher standard, and with significantly more experience under my belt. There is a wealth of new content added, and several features from some of my other MorrowRim mods have been incorporated.

Extra compatibility with:
 - Royalty
 - Ideology
 - Biotech
 - Regrowth Core
 - SeedsPleaseLite
 - SYR Processor Framework
 - Vanilla Expanded Achievements (but not yet)
 - Vanilla Expanded Fishing
 - Vanilla Expanded Framework
 - World Map Beautification Project

Contains patches for:
 - ESCP Spriggans
 - ESCP Dunmer
 - ESCP Maormer
 - ESCP Necromantic Thralls
 - ESCP Trolls
 - MorrowRim Bloodmoon
 - MorrowRim Bonewalkers
 - MorrowRim Telvanni Spiders
 - MorrowRim Telvanni Technology
 - MorrowRim The Sixth House
 - Outland Core
 - Heruan
 - Zombieland
 - Android Tiers Reforged
 - Mechanical Humanlikes
 - Alien vs Predator
 - Dragons Descent
 - Alpha Animals
 - Alpha Bees
 - A Dog Said Animal Prosthetics
 - Vanilla Expanded Outposts
 - Medieval Overhaul
 - Simple FX Smoke
 - Vanilla Expanded Plants
 - Rim of Madness Bones

Other mods that have patches for this:
 - Mashed Lynians
 - Mashed Spiribirds
 - Mashed Spiribugs

 - Very much inspired by the Elder Scrolls series by Bethesda Sutios, with a heavy focus on the nation of Morrowind.
 - Seed bag texture by CitizenKanye
 - Original map used in background made by Bethesda Softworks, and edited together by Raptormeat.
 - Big thanks to Ranger Rick for being a generally great person.
